description: This header file declares functions related to 'icrule actions' within the Zilker SDK. It provides function prototypes for loading, releasing, freeing, and parsing action data structures used in rule processing, and includes relevant external library headers.

methods.name: icrule_action_list_load
methods.description: Loads a list of actions from a specified file into a provided hash map structure.

methods.name: icrule_action_list_release
methods.description: Releases resources associated with a hash map of actions.

methods.name: icrule_free_action
methods.description: Frees memory allocated for an action object.

methods.name: icrule_free_parameter
methods.description: Frees memory associated with a key-value pair parameter.

methods.name: icrule_parse_action
methods.description: Parses an XML node to extract action information into a list and a map.
